# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

SafePHP was made first on PHP 8.0.0, so take in consideration that under this version, SafePHP might not working (not sure at 100%) for the upper versions, there is a garanty to work at least up to PHP 8.3 

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| > 8.3.x |âž–                  |
| 8.3.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| 8.0.x   | :white_check_mark: |                | 
| < 4.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability


Whenever you see something not normal on the code or found a vulnerability, you can join by mail at **thomas.thony.69@gmail.com** . 

If you are a nerd, you can join me on Discord with : **Just-Thomas**
I will awnser as soon as i see the contact.
